name: EvoCreo\u2122
blurb: EvoCreo is a monster collection/battling game in the same spirit as Pokemon, but emphasizes deeper gameplay and monster customization.

rewards.reward: PHEONIX: Are you from our previous Kickstarter project? Then this is the tier for you! ...or if you just want to hang around for the updates.
[Previous Backer Exclusive] STARTER PACKAGE: Start the game with an assortment of high level healing and capture items. See rewards section for details.
EVOCREO: Get a copy of EvoCreo on any platform of your choice!
[Previous Backer Exclusive] STARTER ALT: The starter creo of your choice will have an alternate color scheme. You will also get the previous rewards.
BETA: Be a part of the remaining beta tests for the iOS, Android, OUYA, and PC. You will get to test features of the game before everyone else.
STARTER ALT: The starter creo of your choice will have an alternate color scheme. You will also get the previous rewards.
STARTER PACKAGE: Start the game with an assortment of high level healing and capture items. See rewards section for details.

PRIME: You get one Prime Creo in your line up. Prime Creos are a special type of Creo that are extremely rare to find in the wild. There are eight Prime Creos in Zenith: Fire, Water, Air, Earth, Electric, Nature, Light/Dark, and Normal. We will let you vote on the Prime Creo that you want to include after the project concludes. \r\n\r\nYou also get the other $20 rewards as well as the beta and a copy of the game.
ARENA Lv 1: Create an arena Evoker that will be used in the arenas of the game. This Evoker gets put into the first pool of Arena Evokers.
CARE PACKAGE: Start the game with an assortment of high level healing and capture items. Includes 3 Dominus Links. See rewards section for details.

ARENA Lv 2: Create an arena Evoker that will be used in the arenas of the game. This Evoker gets put into the second pool of arena Evokers. You get all previous rewards. This replaces the ARENA Lv 1 award.
GRAND PACKAGE: Start the game with an assortment of high level healing and capture items. Includes 5 Dominus Links. See rewards section for details.

ARENA Lv 3: Create an arena Evoker that will be used in the arenas of the game. This Evoker gets put into the third pool of arena Evokers. You get all previous rewards. This replaces the ARENA Lv 2 award.

EVOKER: Create an Evoker that can appear anywhere in the world. You can choose the general location based off of our in game map. See rewards section for details. You get all previous rewards. This replaces the ARENA Lv 3 award.
ULTRA PACKAGE: Start the game with an assortment of high level healing and capture items. Includes 25 Dominus Links. See rewards section for details.

UNIQUE NON-EXCLUSIVE EVOKER: Create an Evoker that can appear anywhere in the world. You can create the skin of this Evoker, but we can use it in other areas of the game. You also get the previous rewards. This reward replaces the EVOKER reward. The price includes the cost of all the animations for the NPC you develop.

UNIQUE EXCLUSIVE EVOKER: Create an Evoker that can appear anywhere in the world. You can create a unique skin for this Evoker. No one else in the game will look like your character. You also get the previous rewards. This reward replaces the UNIQUE NON-EXCLUSIVE EVOKER reward. The price includes the cost of all the animations for the NPC you develop.

CREO: Create your own Creo! Design the look, choose the moves, traits... really it's up to you to be as detailed as possible. Note: This is only a single Creo, no evolutions. You also get the previous rewards. The price includes the cost of all the animations for the Creo you develop.
